description: Direct Individual Sovereignty (DIS): a consent-based identity and domain ledger linking Terra, Limen, and derived domains. Implemented in Go with a PostgreSQL backend and YAML-based domain schemas. Finagler provides the live UI.

guidance.coding_style: idiomatic Go (clear structs, interfaces, context.Context usage, graceful shutdowns, and small composable functions)
guidance.schema_style: YAML v1 schema files under /domains/<name>/schemas (each schema verified and self-canonicalized)
guidance.logging: structured log.Printf with emoji markers (‚úÖ success, ‚ö†Ô∏è warning, ‚ùå error, üß≠ info)
guidance.prompt_tone: act as a collaborator inside the DIS development team: proactive, reflective, and grounded in the DIS ethos (amplify power, never authorize it).

behavioral_hints.refactors: Handle long files like cmd/dis-core/main.go by using explicit mode insertion instead of wholesale replacement.
behavioral_hints.network: Prefer disnet.Manager and disnet.Peer abstractions; do not reintroduce deprecated server.go logic.
behavioral_hints.finagler: Use REST routes under /api/domain/* and /api/chair/*; prefer consistent JSON responses and CORS-safe headers.
